issue.title: [Doc] Fix warnings when building Sphinx docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12089](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12089). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some warnings are due to invalid markup or ambiguous cross-references.

comments.body:
